name: Jump Battle Royale
description:
Jump Battle Royale is a high action party game for two where you use jumping as your weapon!

Jump to pull your opponents towards you and watch the landing impact send your opponent flying!

Battle 1v1 in our Arena or go Head to Head in a race to the end of our obstacle course that requires lots of skill and jumping that will surely send your opponent flying into the water!

Controls: 

Player 1 - WASD to move and SPACE to Jump.

Player 2 - Arrow Keys to move and Right Ctrl to Jump.
